about.summary: A GObject library to create cabinet files

name: gcab
raw_meta_yaml:
{% set name = "gcab" %}
{% set version = "1.2" %}

package:
  name: {{ name|lower }}
  version: {{ version }}

source:
  url: http://ftp.acc.umu.se/pub/GNOME/sources/gcab/{{ version }}/gcab-{{ version }}.tar.xz
  sha256: 5a2d96fe7e69e42d363c31cf2370d7afa3bb69cec984d4128322ea40e62c100d
  patches:
    - gcab-disable-vapi.diff

build:
  number: 0
  # Not supported on win and osx
  skip: True  # [win or osx]
  run_exports:
    - {{ pin_subpackage("gcab") }}

requirements:
  build:
    - {{ compiler('c') }}
    - ninja
    - meson
    - pkg-config
  host:
    - gobject-introspection
    - glib
    - zlib

test:
  commands:
    - test -f $PREFIX/lib/libgcab-1.0${SHLIB_EXT}
    - gcab --version

about:
  home: https://github.com/GNOME/gcab
  license: LGPL-2.1-or-later
  license_family: LGPL
  license_file:
    - COPYING
  summary: 'A GObject library to create cabinet files'
  dev_url: https://github.com/GNOME/gcab

extra:
  recipe-maintainers:
    - isuruf
